title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
description: The 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (JavaWork in progress) is exhibiting unexpected behavior. Currently, when attempting to replace the package name fragment 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar', the compressed name is not consistently smaller. This contradicts the expected behavior.
OB: When attempting to replace the package name fragment 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar' in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field, the compressed name is not consistently smaller.
EB: The 'Replace package name fragments with:' field should consistently produce a compressed name that is smaller when replacing the package name fragment 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar'.
SR:
1. Open the preferences in the JavaWork in-progress environment.
2. Navigate to the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field.
3. Enter 'com.ibm.foobar' in the 'Replace' input.
4. Enter 'co~.ib~.foobar' in the 'With' input.
5. Observe that the compressed name is not consistently smaller than the original name.
